resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104055</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104055</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210670</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Transposition: Changing Keys</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umstellung: Ändernde Tasten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transposition : Clés Changeantes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transposition: Chaves Em mudança</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasposizione: Tasti Cambianti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετάθεση: Μεταβαλλόμενα πλήκτρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transposición: Claves Que cambian</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Transposition, or changing the key of a piece of music, can be useful and is sometimes necessary to make music more singable or playable. Music is transposed by raising or lowering every note by the same interval.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umstellung oder das Ändern der Taste eines 
Stückes Musik, können nützlich sein und sind manchmal notwendig, um
Musik singable oder playable zu bilden. Musik wird umgestellt, 
indem man jede Anmerkung durch den gleichen Abstand anhebt oder senkt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La transposition, ou changer la clé d'un morceau 
de musique, peut être utiles et est parfois nécessaire pour rendre 
la musique singable ou jouable. La musique est transposée 
en soulevant ou en abaissant chaque note par le même intervalle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O transposition, ou a mudança da chave de uma 
parte de música, podem ser úteis e são às vezes necessários para 
fazer a música mais singable ou playable. A música é 
transposta levantando ou abaixando cada nota pelo mesmo intervalo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La trasposizione, o cambiare il tasto di una parte
di musica, può essere utili ed è necessaria a volte da rendere la 
musica più singable o playable. La musica è trasposta 
innalzamento o abbassando ogni nota dallo stesso intervallo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μετάθεση, ή η αλλαγή του πλήκτρου ενός κομματιού 
της μουσικής, μπορεί να είναι χρήσιμες και είναι μερικές φορές 
απαραίτητες για να καταστήσει τη μουσική pjo' σηνγαψλε ή 
παικτή. Η μουσική μετατίθεται με την αύξηση ή το χαμήλωμα 
κάθε σημείωσης από το ίδιο διάστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La transposición, o cambiar el clave de un pedazo
de música, puede ser útiles y es a veces necesarias hacer música 
ma's singable o playable. La música es transportada levantando 
o bajando cada nota por el mismo intervalo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
FN:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210670</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104055</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/transposition-changing-keys</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
